grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
variant of 陰|阴[yin1]
surname Yin
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

shade (of a tree)
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined

boulevard/avenue/mall
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
to give shade (of a tree etc)/to shield

Jiayin county in Yichun 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang

Zhang Yinhuan (1837-1900), late Qing politician and senior Chinese diplomat

sentences.english: Cuiyu of water, Longlin of stone, both on its shade.
sentences.chinese: 翠羽之水，龙鳞之石，均荫其上。

sentences.english: My face is foul with weeping, and on my eyelids is the shadow of death;
sentences.chinese: 我的脸因哭泣发紫，在我的眼皮上有死荫。

sentences.english: The sun rose to the mid sky and doves cooed in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 太阳升到中天，鸽子在凉荫中叫唤。

sentences.english: There is much greenery in lands of fog and clouds and shadow.
sentences.chinese: 多云多雾和多荫的地带，草木也葱郁茂盛。

sentences.english: He discovereth deep things out of darkness, and bringeth out to light the shadow of death.
sentences.chinese: 他将深奥的事从黑暗中彰显，使死荫显为光明。

sentences.english: Now our country application's shade seedling is the cloudy M frozen thousand live bacterial vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 现在我国应用的荫苗是阴M冻千活菌苗。

sentences.english: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I fear no evil, for Thou art with me.
sentences.chinese: 我虽行过死荫的幽谷也不怕遭害，因为你与我同在。

sentences.english: The principle of the official system reflected strict hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 用荫原则体现了严格的等级制。

sentences.english: And the oak tree and the cypress grow not in each other ' s shadow.
sentences.chinese: 而橡树和柏树也并不在彼此的荫下生长。

sentences.english: Team A looked for a shady place that some trees could give shade.
sentences.chinese: A队寻找一处有一些树阴的多荫的地方。

sentences.english: The waves have become clamorous, and upon the bank in the shady lane the yellow leaves flutter and fall.
sentences.chinese: 潮声渐喧，河岸的荫滩上黄叶飘落。

sentences.english: It is replaced by new leaves dense, shade built a whole tree.
sentences.chinese: 它换新的叶子密密麻麻，荫盖了整棵树。

sentences.english: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons, and covered us with the shadow of death.
sentences.chinese: 你在野狗之处压伤我们，用死荫遮蔽我们。

sentences.english: Beneath those rugged elms, that yew-tree's shade.
sentences.chinese: 那些粗糙的老榆树下，紫杉荫里。

sentences.english: BUSH】He came out of the shadow of the bush and blinked in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他从灌木荫下出来，在阳光下眨着眼。

sentences.english: Since then I have never set foot again in that champak-shaded villa garden.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，我再也没有踏进那个黄兰花荫的别墅花园。
